problem.markdown: Consider a 2 T heat engine. Which of the following are true? [x] The entropy change of the engine is zero over one cycle. [ ] The entropy of the high-temperature reservoir increases. [x] The entropy of the high-temperature reservoir decreases. [ ] The entropy of the low-temperature reservoir decreases.
problem.p: Consider a 2 T heat engine. Which of the following are true?

checkboxgroup.choice: The entropy change of the engine is zero over one cycle.
The entropy of the high-temperature reservoir increases.
The entropy of the high-temperature reservoir decreases.
The entropy of the low-temperature reservoir decreases.
